name: Behrend, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania

judges: Before Bell, O. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Behrend, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania.
attorneys: B. A. Karlowitz, with him John B. King, William M. Hebrank, Hubert Thurschwell, and Tucker, Burke, Campbell & Arensberg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Behrend, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania.
Argued October 8, 1970.
Before Bell, O. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mark B. Aronson, for appellant.
B. A. Karlowitz, with him John B. King, William M. Hebrank, Hubert Thurschwell, and Tucker, Burke, Campbell & Arensberg, for appellee.
November 12, 1970:
